titleStmt.title: A true and full relation of the manner of the taking of the towne and castle of Shrewsbury. With the conditions on which the castle, and fort at Frankvill, were surrendered. As also, a list of the names of the severall commanders, officers, knights, esquires, gentlemen, and others, that were taken prisoners. Printed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Crane in Pauls-Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 4th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crane in Pauls-Churchyard.
